Obvarujte se gripe
V lanski sezoni se je za cepljenje odločilo nekaj več ljudi: zdravstvena stroka pa cepivo priporoča predvsem kroničnim bolnikom, ne smemo pa pozabiti niti na druge oblike preventive.
02 Nov 2019, 13:12 by E. B.



Pomoč pri gripi in prehladu nam ponuja tudi narava, denimo, ameriški slamnik. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images



Sezona gripe se bo začela predvidoma v drugi polovici decembra. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images



Cepiti se bo mogoče že čez nekaj dni. FOTO: Marko Feist


Že čez nekaj dni se bo mogoče pred gripo obvarovati z najzanesljivejšim orožjem, s cepivom. V Sloveniji se za takšno zaščito še vedno odloča mnogo premalo prebivalcev, čeprav zdravstveni strokovnjaki vseskozi poudarjajo, da je cepljenje nadvse priporočljivo za vse, predvsem pa za starejše od 65 let, kronične bolnike in njihove družinske člane, osebe z izrazito povečano telesno težo, majhne otroke ter nosečnice in njihove družine, zdravstvene delavce in vse, ki so zaposleni v nujnih službah.Pomoč narave Materina dušica ali timijan pomaga pri zdravljenju zgornjih dihalnih poti, saj jih razkužuje, pomirja kašelj in uspava. Prav tako umirja in krepi živce in podpira imunski sistem. Esencialno olje materine dušice deluje antibakterijsko, antivirusno, protiglivično, je antiseptik in diuretik.Korenine in liste sleza uporabljamo za zdravljenje kašlja; slez pomaga pri vzdraženih in vnetih dihalnih poteh in grlu, saj spodbuja izločanje sluzi, ko se ta nabere v pljučih.Bezgove cvetove uporabljamo za zdravljenje okužb zgornjega dela dihal, povezanih z vročino in zamašenimi sinusi. Novejše raziskave so pokazale, da pripravek bezgovih jagod s standardizirano količino antocianinov pomaga blažiti simptome gripe in skrajšuje čas okužbe.Česen zmaguje tudi v boju s sevi virusov, ki povzročajo gripo. Spodbuja dejavnost imunskih celic, deluje tako preventivno, saj preprečuje obolenja, kot tudi zdravilno, saj skrajšuje čas bolezni, kažejo raziskave.Sestavine v žajblju imajo protimikrobne učinke, ki se izkažejo predvsem pri grgranju pripravka iz tega zelišča ob bolečem grlu in angini.Ameriški slamnik krepi odpornost, pomaga pri akutnem vnetju dihalnih poti, tudi pri gripi, prehladu, bronhitisu, sinuzitisu, tonzilitisu, vnetju ušes, pravijo strokovnjaki.
Samo 372 nosečnic


Sezona gripe se bo začela predvidoma v drugi polovici decembra. FOTO: Guliver/Getty Images

Gripa je velika grožnja za javno zdravje in občutno vpliva na obolevnost in umrljivost. Kot pojasnjujejo na Nacionalnem inštitutu za javno zdravje, bo cepivo proti gripi za prihajajočo sezono vključevalo štiri antigene virusov gripe, ki bodo po predvidevanjih Svetovne zdravstvene organizacije, ki je sestavo cepiva letos določila precej pozneje kot običajno, krožili v prihajajoči sezoni. Po podatkih NIJZ se je delež cepljenih v minuli sezoni v primerjavi s predhodno nekoliko povečal: zanj se je namreč odločilo 4,5 odstotka prebivalstva, medtem ko se je leto dni prej 4,1 odstotka. Točneje, proti gripi se je cepilo 94.049 Slovenk in Slovencev, spodbuden pa je podatek, da se je povečal tudi delež cepljenih v skupini starejših od 65 let, z 11,7 odstotka na 12,9. Pred gripo se je s cepivom zaščitilo 54.470 zdravih ljudi in 39.579 kroničnih bolnikov, med nosečnicami se jih je za to odločilo 372. In čeprav bi pričakovali, da se bodo zdravstveni delavci, ki bi morali postavljati zgled javnosti, proti gripi cepili v veliko večjem številu, se jih je za to odločilo še manj kakor leto prej: lani je bilo takšnih 5794, predlani pa 5861.
Dosledno umivanje rok
Na NIJZ cepljenje toplo priporočajo predvsem bolnikom, kamor uvrščajo tiste s kroničnimi boleznimi obtočil, dihal, sečil in jeter, metabolnimi boleznimi, nekaterimi živčno-mišičnimi in vezivnimi boleznimi, malignimi obolenji, boleznimi krvi in krvotvornih organov, boleznimi, ki slabijo imunski odziv, pa tudi otroke, ki so se dlje zdravili s salicilati. Ob cepljenju so nujni tudi drugi preventivni ukrepi: kot svetujejo strokovnjaki, moramo skrbeti za ustrezen življenjski slog z zdravo prehrano, izogibanjem škodljivim navadam, kot sta kajenje in čezmerno uživanje alkohola, uravnoteženim razmerjem med delom in počitkom, skrbjo za osebno higieno, predvsem si dosledno umivamo roke. Pozorni smo tudi na higieno kašlja, če zbolimo, pa se izogibamo krajem, kjer se zbira veliko ljudi.Sezona gripe se v Sloveniji največkrat začne v drugi polovici decembra, največ zbolelih je proti koncu januarja in v prvi polovici februarja. Po cepljenju proti gripi se zaščita vzpostavi v dveh tednih, zato bo časa za cepljenje dovolj. O naravni podpori pri gripi in prehladu pa si lahko preberete v okvirčku. 


Cepiti se bo mogoče že čez nekaj dni. FOTO: Marko Feist

Beware of the flu
Last season, a few more people decided to vaccinate: the health profession recommends the vaccine primarily to chronic patients, and other forms of prevention should not be forgotten.
02 Nov 2019, 13:12 by E. B.



Help with the flu and cold is also provided by nature, such as the American straw man. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images



Flu season is expected to start in the second half of December. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images



It will be possible to vaccinate in a few days. PHOTO: Marko Feist


In just a few days, it will be possible to protect yourself with the most reliable weapon, the vaccine, before the flu. In Slovenia, too little population is still in favor of such protection, although health experts have consistently stressed that vaccination is highly recommended for all, especially for the over-65s, chronic patients and their family members, overweight people, small children and pregnant women and their families, health care professionals and anyone who works in emergency services. Nature's help The mother's thyme or thyme helps to treat the upper respiratory tract by disinfecting them, relieving cough and drowsiness. It also soothes and strengthens the nerves and supports the immune system. The essential oil of the mother's mother is antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal, antiseptic and diuretic. Roots and spleen are used to treat cough; The spleen helps with irritated and inflamed airways and throat, as it promotes mucus secretion when it builds up in the lungs. Eyebrows are used to treat upper respiratory tract infections associated with fever and clogged sinuses. More recent studies have shown that the preparation of elder berries with a standardized amount of anthocyanins helps to alleviate the symptoms of the flu and shorten the time of infection. Garlic also wins the fight against strains of influenza viruses. It stimulates the activity of immune cells, it works both preventively, preventing disease, and healing as it shortens the time of the disease, research shows. it strengthens resistance, helps with acute inflammation of the airways, including influenza, colds, bronchitis, sinusitis, tonsillitis, ear infections, experts say.
Only 372 pregnant women


Flu season is expected to start in the second half of December. PHOTO: Gulliver / Getty Images

Flu is a major public health threat and has a significant impact on morbidity and mortality. According to the National Institute of Public Health, the influenza vaccine for the coming season will include four influenza virus antigens, which according to the World Health Organization, which has determined the composition of the vaccine much later than usual this year, will circulate in the coming season. According to the NIJZ, the share of vaccinations increased slightly in the previous season: 4.5 percent of the population opted for it, compared to 4.1 percent a year ago. More precisely, 94,049 Slovenes were vaccinated against the flu, but it is encouraging that the share of vaccines in the 65+ group has increased, from 11.7 percent to 12.9. The flu vaccine protected 54,470 healthy people and 39,579 chronic patients, with 372. among pregnant women, and although health professionals who should set an example for the public would be expected to be vaccinated in much greater numbers , less than a year earlier: 5794 of them last year and 5861 of them in the previous year.
Consistent washing of hands
Vaccination is strongly recommended at the NIPH, especially for patients with chronic diseases of the circulatory system, respiratory tract, urinary tract and liver, metabolic diseases, certain neuromuscular and connective diseases, malignancies, diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs, diseases that weaken the immune response. also children who have been treated for longer with salicylates. Vaccination also requires other preventative measures: as advised by experts, we must take care of a proper lifestyle with a healthy diet, avoiding harmful habits such as smoking and excessive alcohol consumption, a balanced work-to-rest ratio, care for personal hygiene, especially consistently we wash our hands. We also pay attention to the hygiene of coughing, but if we get sick we avoid places where many people gather. After influenza vaccination, protection is restored within two weeks, so vaccination time will be sufficient. You can read about natural support for flu and colds in the box.
